name: permissions
description: Permission modes that control how much your AI CLI asks before acting.
author: invariant.guru

instructions.name: low
instructions.description: Ultra-cautious mode — AI asks confirmation for every action.

instructions.name: medium
instructions.description: Balanced mode — AI asks for shell commands and destructive actions only.

instructions.name: high
instructions.description: Permissive mode — AI asks only for critical or dangerous operations.

instructions.name: yolo
instructions.description: Full autopilot — AI never asks and executes everything autonomously.
